page.title: 13Mickleton Gardening Club
page.content: Towards the end of 1980 several interested parties met in the village to discuss the formation of a garden- ing club.The first meeting,at which a Committee was formed,was held in January 1981 at the Joseph Webb Hall. It was agreed to have a monthly meeting on the third Wednesday at King George's Hall.Speakers have lectured on a wide range of topics.Many specialists have spoken about their particular interests,and amateurs have shown slides of their own beautiful gardens and spurred members to greater efforts when dealing with their own gardens.COACH OUTINGS to Stately Homes,Botanical Gardens,Arboretums and Garden Centres are organised.The main event of the year is the FLOWER AND PRODUCE SHOW in September. The MEMBERSHIP in July 1985 is 235.
